title: CMU Poker AI 2025
description: Build an AI agent to play heads-up poker. Compete for $6,000 in prizes and learn from industry experts and researchers.
highlights: Connect with recruiters and researchers from Jump Trading
Learn game theory and AI strategies through expert workshops
No prior poker knowledge needed - just bring your coding skills

title: CMU AI Agents Day
description: A one-day mini-hackathon focused on building innovative AI agents. Learn about LLMs, experiment with cutting-edge AI frameworks, and create solutions to real-world problems.
highlights: Learn about LLMs and AI agents through beginner-friendly workshops
Build projects using Langchain, vector databases, and API integrations
Win prizes and swag for the most innovative AI agent solutions

title: CMU Anomaly Hunter
description: Build high-performance anomaly detection systems that balance accuracy, latency, and efficiency. Teams compete to detect anomalies in real-time data streams, with scoring based on both detection quality and system performance.
highlights: Develop real-time anomaly detection systems using industry-standard tools
Compete on accuracy, latency, and resource efficiency metrics
Learn practical skills in ML ops and distributed systems

title: CMU AI Sustainability Datathon 2024
description: A week-long data science competition where participants analyze the environmental impact of AI in finance. Create innovative strategies to enhance the sustainability and eco-friendliness of AI applications.
highlights: Explore the intersection of AI, finance, and environmental sustainability
Organized by CMU DSC + Students Using Data for Social Good
Build models to measure and optimize AI's carbon footprint

title: CMU Poker AI 2024
description: Build an AI agent to play heads-up poker. Compete for $6,000 in prizes and learn from industry experts and researchers.
highlights: Connect with top trading firms including Jump Trading, HRT, Jane Street
Learn game theory and AI strategies through expert workshops
No prior poker knowledge needed - just bring your coding skills
